name: Fire Elemental Creature
description: A version of normal creatures that inhabit the Fire Elemental Plane.
applicable_to: Any corporeal Aberration, Animal, Magical Beast, Plant, or Vermin.

special_abilities.title: Extra Fire Damage
special_abilities.description: Deals additional fire damage based on hit dice when hitting with natural weapons. Target must make a Reflex save DC 7 + HD to avoid catching fire for 1d4 rounds.

special_abilities.title: Immunities
special_abilities.description: Immune to poison, sleep, paralysis, stunning, and critical hits.

languages: Can speak Ignan if Intelligence is 4 or higher.

name: Air Elemental Creature
description: A version of normal creatures that inhabit the Air Elemental Plane.
applicable_to: Any corporeal Aberration, Animal, Magical Beast, Plant, or Vermin.

special_abilities.title: Airborne Advantage
special_abilities.description: Airborne creatures have -1 to attack and damage rolls against you.

immunities: Poison, Sleep, Paralysis, Stunning, Critical Hits
languages: Can speak Auran if Intelligence is 4 or higher.

name: Cold Elemental Creature
description: A version of normal creatures that inhabit the Ice Elemental Plane. They appear similar to their originals but are made from ice and snow, with icicles for teeth.
applicable_to: Any corporeal Aberration, Animal, Magical Beast, Plant, or Vermin.

special_abilities.title: Extra Cold Damage
special_abilities.description: Deals extra cold damage based on hit dice when hitting with natural weapons.

immunities: Poison, Sleep, Paralysis, Stunning, Critical Hits
languages: Can speak Auran or Aquan if Intelligence is 4 or higher.

name: Earth Elemental Creature
description: A version of normal creatures that inhabit the Earth Elemental Plane. They appear as moving piles of dirt and rocks in the shape of their base creature.
applicable_to: Any corporeal Aberration, Animal, Magical Beast, Plant, or Vermin.

movement.burrow: Like a Xorn at the creature’s base speed or 20’, whichever is higher.

special_abilities.title: Ground Combat
special_abilities.description: Gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage if both you and your opponent are both touching the ground. If your opponent is in the air or water, suffer a -4 penalty on attack and damage.
special_abilities.awareness: Aware of anything in contact with the ground within 60 feet.

immunities: Poison, Sleep, Paralysis, Stunning, Critical Hits
languages: Can speak Terran if Intelligence is 4 or higher.

name: Ice Elemental Creature
description: A version of normal creatures that inhabit the Ice Para-Elemental Plane. They appear similar to their originals but are made from translucent ice.
applicable_to: Any corporeal Aberration, Animal, Dragon, Fey, Giant, Humanoid, Magical Beast, Monstrous Humanoid, Plant, or Vermin.

special_abilities.title: Extra Cold Damage
special_abilities.description: Deals extra Cold damage based on hit dice when hitting with natural weapons.

immunities: Poison, Sleep, Paralysis, Stunning, Critical Hits
languages: Can speak Auran and Aquan if Intelligence is 4 or higher.

name: Ooze Elemental Creature
description: A version of normal creatures that inhabit the Ooze Para-Elemental Plane. They appear similar to their originals but are made from dark brown muck.
applicable_to: Any corporeal Aberration, Animal, Dragon, Fey, Giant, Humanoid, Magical Beast, Monstrous Humanoid, Plant, or Vermin.

special_abilities.title: Extra Acid Damage
special_abilities.description: Deals extra Acid damage based on hit dice when hitting with natural weapons. Wood and metal weapons that strike an Ooze Elemental creature dissolve immediately (RefNeg, DC is Constitution-based). Each round an Ooze Elemental creature is in contact with a wood or metal object, it takes (10 + ½ HD + Constitution modifier) Acid damage.

immunities: Poison, Sleep, Paralysis, Stunning, Critical Hits
languages: Can speak Aquan and Terran if Intelligence is 4 or higher.

name: Smoke Elemental Creature
description: A version of normal creatures that inhabit the Smoke Para-Elemental Plane. They appear similar to their originals but are made from dark brown muck.
applicable_to: Any corporeal Aberration, Animal, Dragon, Fey, Giant, Humanoid, Magical Beast, Monstrous Humanoid, Plant, or Vermin.

special_abilities.title: Smoke Claws
special_abilities.description: A Smoke Elemental creature may engulf a creature by moving into its square (which does not provoke an attack of opportunity). The target creature then takes Smoke Claw damage each round (FortNeg, DC is Constitution-based).

immunities: Poison, Sleep, Paralysis, Stunning, Critical Hits
languages: Can speak Auran and Ignan if Intelligence is 4 or higher.

name: Water Elemental Creature
description: A version of normal creatures that inhabit the Water Elemental Plane. It appears similar to its base creature but is made from water.
applicable_to: Any corporeal Aberration, Animal, Magical Beast, Plant, or Vermin.

special_abilities.title: Water Bonus
special_abilities.description: Gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage if both you and your opponent are both touching water. Can put out fires, including magical fires, on a dispel magic roll. If you or your opponent are on land, suffer a -4 penalty on attack and damage.

immunities: Poison, Sleep, Paralysis, Stunning, Critical Hits
languages: Can speak Aquan if Intelligence is 4 or higher.

name: Wood Elemental Creature
description: A version of normal creatures that inhabit the Wood Elemental Plane. They appear similar to their originals but are made from wood, branches, and leaves.
applicable_to: Any corporeal Aberration, Animal, Magical Beast, Plant, or Vermin.

special_abilities.title: Wooden Spikes
special_abilities.description: May launch wooden spikes up to 120 feet without range penalty. Each spike does 1d6 + Str modifier damage. The creature may launch its HD in spikes per day. Aware of anything in contact with plants within 60 feet.

immunities: Poison, Sleep, Paralysis, Stunning, Critical Hits
languages: Can speak Sylvan and Treant if Intelligence is 4 or higher.

name: Arctic (ice-Dweller)
description: The frigid lands near the poles of the world are home to many unusual creatures, including several humanoid races. These ice-dwellers make their homes in and around massive glaciers, navigate ice-choked waters in flat, sturdy boats, and thrive despite living in one of the harshest environments imaginable. It should come as no surprise that the primary focus of ice-dwellers is survival, and they tend to have a harsher outlook on life than those who live in temperate climates.

special_abilities.title: Ability Adjustments:
special_abilities.description: An ice-dweller retains allhis ancestral race's ability adjustments. In addition, he gains +2 Con and -2 Cha.

special_abilities.title: Skills:
special_abilities.description: Ice-dwellers gain a +2 racial bonus on all Wilderness Lore checks because they are taught to survive in the wild from a young age.

special_abilities.title: Spell-Like Abilities::
special_abilities.description: An ice-dweller whose ancestral race had spell-like abilities retains those and also gains the ability to use ray of frost once per day as a ist-level caster.
